ItemDesc: Weapon remnants left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces moderately for <color=#f29e38ff>Destruction</color> characters.
ItemBGDesc: This brand represents their rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction. The master of this weapon carries a strong hatred for all sentient beings. They relish in the lament of intelligent beings as sweet melodies and topple civilizations with millennia of history in the blink of an eye. "The bearer of this brand is tasked with stopping breath among the living."
